menu.description: Cottage cheese cubes in a rich and creamy tomato-based gravy with aromatic spices.
Aromatic basmati rice cooked with tender chicken pieces, saffron, and traditional spices.
Crispy rice and lentil crepe filled with spicy potato filling, served with chutney and sambar.
Slow-cooked black lentils in a creamy tomato sauce, infused with butter and spices.
Soft, deep-fried dough balls soaked in a sweet rose-flavored sugar syrup.
Tender chicken pieces cooked in a creamy tomato-based sauce with butter and spices.
Soft and fluffy leavened flatbread, traditionally cooked in a tandoor.
Whole wheat flatbread stuffed with a spiced potato filling, served with yogurt or pickle.
Spongy and soft cheese balls soaked in light sugar syrup, a classic Bengali sweet.
Paneer cubes cooked in a thick, creamy spinach sauce with Indian spices.
Spicy and flavorful biryani with basmati rice, marinated chicken, and a blend of spices.
Steamed rice cakes served with a savory lentil and vegetable stew.
Spicy potato fritter sandwiched in a bun, served with chutneys.
Spicy vegetable mash served with buttered buns and garnished with onions and lemon.
Crispy, spiral-shaped sweets soaked in sugar syrup, served warm.
Fragrant basmati rice cooked with marinated meat and a blend of spices.
Slow-cooked stew made with meat, lentils, and wheat, seasoned with traditional spices.
Marinated chicken cooked on low heat in a sealed pot to retain flavors.
Sweet dish made from dried apricots, served with cream or ice cream.
Rich bread pudding made with fried bread slices, milk, and dry fruits.
Soft and fluffy rice pancakes served with a coconut milk-based vegetable or meat stew.
Steamed rice cake cylinders served with spicy black chickpea curry.
Mildly spiced fish curry cooked in coconut milk and spices.
Spicy and flavorful fried beef dish, a Kerala specialty.
Crispy and salty banana slices, deep-fried to perfection.
Traditional Bengali fish curry with mustard seeds and spices.
Light fish stew cooked with vegetables and mild spices.
Slow-cooked spicy mutton curry, a Bengali classic.
Soft and sweet dessert made from fresh paneer, flavored with cardamom.
Fermented sweet yogurt, a popular Bengali dessert.
Stuffed flatbread baked in a tandoor, served with chole and chutney.
Traditional Punjabi dish made with mustard greens and spices.
Cornmeal flatbread, usually served with Sarson Da Saag.
Thick and creamy yogurt-based drink, sweet or salted.
Spicy chickpea curry served with fluffy deep-fried bread.
A traditional Rajasthani dish consisting of baked wheat balls, lentil curry, and sweetened crushed wheat.
Gram flour dumplings cooked in a spicy yogurt-based curry.
Spicy red meat curry made with mutton and a variety of Rajasthani spices.
Deep-fried pastry filled with spiced lentils, served with chutney.
Sweet pancakes soaked in sugar syrup, garnished with nuts.
Spicy and tangy prawn pickle made with a blend of Goan spices.
Fish marinated with a spicy recheado paste and shallow fried.
Layered Goan dessert made from coconut milk, eggs, and sugar.
Spicy pork sausages made with Goan spices, usually served with bread.
Spicy pork stew, a Goan specialty, cooked with vinegar and spices.
Thick pancake made from rice and lentil batter, topped with vegetables.
Lentil doughnuts soaked in spicy lentil and vegetable stew.
Semolina-based sweet dish flavored with saffron and garnished with nuts.
Crispy and savory fried lentil doughnuts, served with chutney.
Strong South Indian coffee served with frothy milk in a steel tumbler.
